model-value.desc: Model of the component of type { min, max } (both values must be between global min/max); Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

drag-range.desc: User can drag range instead of just the two thumbs

drag-only-range.desc: User can drag only the range instead and NOT the two thumbs

left-label-color.desc: Color name for left label background from the Quasar Color Palette

left-label-text-color.desc: Color name for left label text from the Quasar Color Palette

right-label-color.desc: Color name for right label background from the Quasar Color Palette

right-label-text-color.desc: Color name for right label text from the Quasar Color Palette

left-label-value.desc: Override default label for min value

right-label-value.desc: Override default label for max value

left-thumb-color.desc: Color name (from the Quasar Color Palette) for left thumb

right-thumb-color.desc: Color name (from the Quasar Color Palette) for right thumb
